title: Sib (The Apple), 1998 - Samira Makhmalbaf
description:
SIB (THE APPLE) 1998

After twelve years of imprisonment by their own parents, two sisters are finally released by social workers to face the outside world for the first time.

Director: Samira Makhmalbaf
Writers: Mohsen Makhmalbaf, Samira Makhmalbaf
Stars: Massoumeh Naderi, Zahra Naderi, Ghorban Ali Naderi

Samira Makhmalbaf 
With a simple and poetic language, in a neo-realist tradition, the young director recreates a significant episode in Iranian society today, revealing a promising new filmmaking talent.
